linkWithCurriculum.title: Direct Link with the School Curriculum
linkWithCurriculum.description: Free educational resources available for comprehensive support before and after the experience.

gradeLevel.title: Suitable for CM1 & CM2 Students
gradeLevel.description: The experience has been designed and tested to match the students' level.

duration.title: 2-3 Hour Duration
duration.description: Immerse yourself in an immersive setting for half a day to explore various themes about Nature.

masthead.newsTitle: Our exhibition will be available in Annecy from June to December 2023.
masthead.newsDescription: Located near the city center of Annecy, 'La Turbine' is a warm and immersive space ideal for a collaborative experience.

demo.title: Elie, an educational tool to discover life
demo.subtitle1: The exhibition follows a guided path, based on a fun team game.
demo.subtitle2: The game leads students to collaborate in identifying species from clues and discovering their interactions. It engages students' senses and analytical thinking.

advice.title: Reviews from our participants
advice.paragraph: Thank you for all your feedback that helps us improve the ELIE experience.
advice.tristanQuote: “I loved playing with my friends, and the sound of the deer was super funny too!”
advice.sarahQuote: “I felt a real interest from the students during the classroom session.”
advice.ericQuote: “Very useful, I saved time during my explanations.”
advice.claraQuote: “With Elliot, we discovered the remora, it was awesome to see the shark too.”

gallery.title: Experience in Images
gallery.description: Elie has been made possible by you since 2023, and your enthusiasm continues to surprise us.

preparation.title: Preparing for your visit
preparation.prepareGroupsSpan: groups of 3 students with a team name.

reservation.reservation.title: Visiting Elie Exhibition in 4 Steps
reservation.reservation.conditionText: You have a 15-minute session that can be renewed to complete your reservation on the website. In case of payment, it will be permanently blocked. You can cancel a reservation and get a refund up to 5 working days prior to the time slot date. For any cancellation request, please contact us by email at contact@elie.fr.
reservation.reservation.studentNumber: How many students do you have?

profil.adviceInfo: *You can provide the advice of a student, it will be recorded under your email address.
